name: Ruka
description: An Anime themed Telegram group management bot

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon and pyrogram

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon and pyrogram

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username

SUPPORT_ID.description: Your Telegram support group chat username

EVENT_LOGS.description: Event logs channel to note down important bot level events

JOIN_LOGGER.description: A channel where bot will print who added it to what group, useful during debugging or spam handling

ERROR_LOGS.description: A channel where bot will print errors

ARQ_API_KEY.description: For Some Modules. Get it from @ArqRobot

CASH_API_KEY.description: Required for currency converter. Get yours from https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information. Get yours from https://timezonedb.com/api

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Ruka support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours

sw_api.description: Spamwatch API Token, Get one from @SpamWatchBot.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only)

WHITE_LIST.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as whitelist users

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks. If you dont know how this works leave it as it is

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks. Better leave this as it is on heroku

No_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /. Recommended is True

AI_API_KEY.description: Make your bot talk using chatbot API

WALL_API.description: Required for wallpaper. Get your's from https://wall.alphacoders.com/
